name: SetJobStatus
description:
Update the status of a job by its ID.

This tool updates the status of a job based on its ID. It validates transitions between statuses: Drafts can be changed to Open or Archived, Open jobs to Closed, Closed jobs to Draft or Archived, and Archived jobs to Draft. It requires the 'jobsWrite' permission.

parameters.name: job_status_update_payload
parameters.description: A JSON object containing 'jobId' and 'status'. 'jobId' is the identifier of the job, and 'status' is the new status for the job. Acceptable transitions: Draft to Open/Archived, Open to Closed, Closed to Draft/Archived, Archived to Draft.
